###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBandLength

###Description###
Get Length of the band, in pixels

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiRebar.au3>
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBandLength($hWnd, $iIndex)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to rebar control
$iIndex
	Zero-based index of the band
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: Length of the band, in pixels

###Remarks###
None.
